name: 世界和平 (World Peace)
description: The narrative of 世界和平 centers on promoting global harmony and unity through blockchain technology. Inspired by the universal desire for peace, the token embodies a vision of hope and renewal, symbolized by imagery of a dove flying toward a sunrise. While no specific key events or prominent individuals have been directly tied to its launch on the BSC chain, discussions on social platforms highlight its symbolic message resonating with the crypto community. The project aims to foster cross-cultural solidarity, aligning with broader ideals of social harmony, though it currently lacks association with major projects or well-known figures.
